original_text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
korean_text: 눈이 손더러 내가 너를 쓸 데가 없다 하거나 또한 머리가 발더러 내가 너를 쓸 데가 없다 하지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: And eye cannot say unto the hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 눈은 손에게 말할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: I have no need of thee
nor again the head to the feet
I have no need of you
